mapper.select: SELECT ARTICLE_ID articleId , ARTICLE_NUMBER articleNumber , SUBJECT subject , DESCRIPTION description , WRITER writer , CREATED_DATE createdDate , MODIFIED_DATE modifiedDate , RECOMMEND recommend FROM ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId}

SELECT ARTICLE_ID articleId , ARTICLE_NUMBER articleNumber , SUBJECT subject , DESCRIPTION description , WRITER writer , CREATED_DATE createdDate , MODIFIED_DATE modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , ARTICLE.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ARTICLE ORDER BY ARTICLE_ID DESC ) ARTICLE WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endIndex} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startIndex}
